org.vctsi.internal.its

Interface CommentConverter<COMMENT,ISSUE>

  • Type Parameters:
    COMMENT - the class of a comment that can be processed by this class
    ISSUE - the class of an issue that can be used to get additional information about the comment
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BugzillaCommentConverter, GitHubCommentConverter, GitLabCommentConverter

    public interface CommentConverter<COMMENT,ISSUE>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IssueComment convertToIssueComment(COMMENT comment)
      converts a COMMENT to an IssueComment
      String getAuthor(COMMENT comment, ISSUE issue)
      get the author of a comment
      int getCommentId(COMMENT comment, ISSUE issue)
      get the id of the comment
      Date getCreationDate(COMMENT comment, ISSUE issue)
      get the date when the comment was created
      String getDescription(COMMENT comment, ISSUE issue)
      get the description of a comment
      int getTicketId(COMMENT comment, ISSUE issue)
      get the ticket id for the comment

    • Method Detail

      • convertToIssueComment

        IssueComment convertToIssueComment(COMMENT comment)
        converts a COMMENT to an IssueComment
        Parameters:
        comment - a comment that shall be converted
        Returns:
        a IssueComment representation of the parameter

        int getCommentId(COMMENT comment,
                 ISSUE issue)
        get the id of the comment
        Parameters:

        issue - issue containing the object (can be null)
        Returns:
        the id of the comment

        get the ticket id for the comment
